This game is Fucking Awesome dude pls make portal 3

To my mind one of the best games ever made. Definitely a milestone in videogame history.
Was absolutely amazed to see that there are lots of community levels available in the workshop for single player as well as for coop.
Though the solo part of the game is quite short, there are tons of community coop levels as well as Valve's official coop ones. It's very fun to play and has aged like good wine. 11/10

this is the best game ever, it has a great story, a lot of gameplay and so much replayability and if you get bored while playing alone you can play coop with a buddy which is always 10x funnier then the singleplayer

Honestly, this is the one of the first games I knew I had to get on Steam and I am loving every moment of it. I've played through this game so many times, but each time feels special. It's like that Rubik's Cube you pick up every once and awhile, but this game I can actually solve. 10/10 Wish they would make a 3rd one - Valve please... Portal 3, get on that. 2020 make it happen, I'm sure it would be worth the wait ;)

Such a lovely and beautiful game
Always a valve classic

Portal and Portal 2 are awesome games that I always fall back on if I need to cool off. There's no rush and no competition. It's just a giant puzzle for me to solve and I love that more than I can put into words. I can easily highly recommend this game. It has a large and engaging solo AND co-op mode, as well as endless player made test chambers to solve once you've beaten the story, plus the free Portal Stories: Mel mod you can get off the Steam Store for free (so long as you own Portal 2) that is it's own entire new game. Awesome game, awesome community, can't recommend enough.
it really makes you FEEL LIKE A PORTAL! BUT TWICE!
